scripts.dev:shell: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File scripts/cargo-with-cef-env.ps1 run -p pulse-shell -- --pulse-ui-url http://localhost:5173 --pulse-content-url https://www.microsoft.com/edge
scripts.build: pnpm --dir apps/ui build && powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File scripts/cargo-with-cef-env.ps1 build -p pulse-shell --release
scripts.check: pnpm --dir apps/ui lint && pnpm --dir apps/site lint && powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File scripts/cargo-with-cef-env.ps1 check --workspace
